CustomField.formula: IF( AND( RecordTypeId = "012C0000000UlfO", OR(BillingCountry = "United States", BillingCountry = "Canada") ), IF( Total_Sales_Full_Previous_Year__c>15000, "A", IF( Total_Sales_Full_Previous_Year__c>5000, "B", IF( Total_Sales_Full_Previous_Year__c>1500, "C", IF( Total_Sales_Full_Previous_Year__c>0, "D", NULL)))), IF( AND( OR (Dental_Org_ABC__c ="DNDE", Dental_Org_ABC__c ="DNFR") ), IF(Last_Year_Sales__c>50000,"A1", IF( Last_Year_Sales__c>25000, "A2", IF(Last_Year_Sales__c>15000, "A3", IF(Last_Year_Sales__c>10000, "A4", IF(Last_Year_Sales__c>5000, "B", IF(Last_Year_Sales__c>1000, "C", IF(Last_Year_Sales__c>0, "D", NULL))))))), NULL))
CustomField.label: Customer Sub Type
